Through original programming, documentaries, and expert-led discussions, MHTN aims to increase awareness, provide valuable information, and encourage open conversations about mental well-being.

programme.title: Quo Vadis TV
programme.desc: Quo Vadis TV is committed to sharing the Biblical message in a way that makes Christian living practical, realistic, and attainable. Our theme is summarized the question: "where are you going?" Our Aim with this inquiry is to help people find orientation and find the path back to God.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright is the patriarch of an all-male Nevada ranching family. Set during and after the Civil War, "Bonanza" is the story of life on the family's thousand-acre spread, known as the Ponderosa, near Virginia City. Ben has his three sons, each with a different (and deceased) mother. Serious eldest son Adam hopes to follow in his father's footsteps; middle son Hoss is a gentle giant -- physically strong, but sometimes naive; and youngest son Little Joe is the most impetuous and romantic of the offspring.

programme.title: National Icons
programme.desc: Ce programme mets en lumière et compare les performances des plus grands athlètes du passé et d'aujourd'hui.

programme.title: Clubland
programme.desc: Clubland rend hommage aux meilleurs clubs, aux meilleurs joueurs et aux plus grands supporters au monde.

programme.title: Goat - the greatest of all time
programme.desc: Secretariat, Frankel, American Pharoah et bien d'autres se disputent le titre de plus grand cheval de course de tous les temps.

programme.title: The Iconic
programme.desc: Un retour sur les moments sportifs les plus emblématiques de ces dernières années.

programme.title: Sports Woman
programme.desc: Hannah Mills et Saskia Clark ont marqué l'histoire de la voile avant qu'Elidh McIntyre n'entre en scène. Lydia Ko a fait une entrée fracassante sur la LPGA et la karatéka Sandra Sánchez a prouvé qu'il n'est jamais trop tard pour réaliser ses rêves.

programme.title: Goat - the greatest of all time
programme.desc: Les Bulls de Jordan, les Celtics de Bill Russell, les Lakers de Magic ou les Warriors à trois points? Quelle est la meilleure équipe NBA de tous les temps?

programme.title: The Short List
programme.desc: Le décompte des 10 meilleurs personnages de la NBA.

programme.title: Goat - the greatest of all time
programme.desc: Qui est le plus grand basketteur de tous les temps?

programme.title: Star Block Workout
programme.desc: Pars à la rencontre de Boost (mrblockworkout), ancien bad boy de 23 ans qui a créé sa propre manière de faire du fitness, en utilisant uniquement son corps et l'environnement urbain.

programme.title: Hommage
programme.desc: Usain Bolt a illuminé les pistes d'athlétisme tandis que Cam Newton a marqué de son style le foot américain et Babe Ruth a rendu le baseball cool à nouveau à sa façon...

programme.title: National Icons
programme.desc: Ce programme mets en lumière et compare les performances des plus grands athlètes du passé et d'aujourd'hui.

programme.title: Clubland
programme.desc: Clubland rend hommage aux meilleurs clubs, aux meilleurs joueurs et aux plus grands supporters au monde.

programme.title: Fight Stars
programme.desc: Dans Fight Stars, retrouvez les grandes stars des sports de combat, parmi lesquelles la championne d'UFC Amanda Nunes ou le boxeur David Hayes. On reviendra sur les hauts et les bas de la carrière de Mike Tyson, et enfin Nikki Bella rêve éveillée !

programme.title: Foul Play
programme.desc: Une collection de documentaires explorant la face sombre des Jeux olympiques et de l'histoire du sport.

programme.title: The Iconic
programme.desc: Retour sur les écarts de conduite emblématiques dans le sport, avec Mike Tyson, Marion Jones et Eric Cantona.

programme.title: The Challenge
programme.desc: Dans cet épisode, on escalade et on illumine une cascade gelée en Norvège, on établit un nouveau record de montée au sommet d'El Capitan et on fait du free-climbing en Autriche.

programme.title: Only Live Once
programme.desc: Only Live Once s'intéresse à deux événements qui atteignent leur phase finale. Tout d'abord, l'action en salle se déroule à la Porsche Arena de Stuttgart, où les meilleurs grimpeurs de bloc du monde participent à l'Annual Adidas Rock Stars.

programme.title: The Challenge
programme.desc: Dans cet épisode, on escalade et on illumine une cascade gelée en Norvège, on établit un nouveau record de montée au sommet d'El Capitan et on fait du free-climbing en Autriche.

programme.title: Star Block Workout
programme.desc: Pars à la rencontre de Boost (mrblockworkout), ancien bad boy de 23 ans qui a créé sa propre manière de faire du fitness, en utilisant uniquement son corps et l'environnement urbain.

programme.title: Homage
programme.desc: Dans cet épisode : c'est le rebel en opposition au pouvoir Mohamed Ali, l'homme tombé en disgrâce et revenu de plus belle Roberto Duran, et un homme qui d'apparence n'a rien de spécial mais qui a su prouvé le contraire, Tony Bellew.

programme.title: National Icons
programme.desc: Carlos Valderrama a accompagné la Colombie lors de trois coupes du monde mais le pays connut ensuite des années sombres... jusqu'à l'arrivée de James Rodriguez qui a épaté le monde en 2014. Mais aussi Casillas vs De Gea.

programme.title: Goat - the greatest of all time
programme.desc: Williams, Navratilova, Court, Lenglen? Les prétendantes au titre de plus grande joueuse de tennis de tous les temps.

programme.title: The Iconic
programme.desc: Les icônes du Tour de France : Mark Cavendish, Cadel Evans, Chris Froome et Eddy Merckx.

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: Les histoires qui se cachent derrière les images les plus emblématiques du sport. Les origines, les conséquences, les moments de suspense et les circonstances des points clés de l'histoire du sport.

programme.title: Perfection
programme.desc: Dans Perfection, découvrez ou redécouvrez les meilleurs moments de sport, les plus inspirants, les plus forts en émotions, les plus grands exploits. Les fans de sports seront comblés !

programme.title: The Truth About
programme.desc: La vérité, toute la vérité. Un magazine pas comme les autres, qui démarre là où les matchs s'arrêtent. Faites toute la lumière à chaque édition sur un sujet différent, et découvrez la vérité sur vos clubs, stars et sportifs préférés.

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: Le huitième titre record de Roger Federer à Wimbledon, l'une des plus grandes surprises de l'histoire de l'UFC et American Pharoah qui remporte la Triple Couronne.

programme.title: Star Block Workout
programme.desc: Pars à la rencontre de Boost (mrblockworkout), ancien bad boy de 23 ans qui a créé sa propre manière de faire du fitness, en utilisant uniquement son corps et l'environnement urbain.

programme.title: Hommage
programme.desc: Nous rendons hommage aux footballeurs italiens : Antonio Conte qui a joué et managé avec passion, Paolo Maldini qui a repris une autre carrière sportive après le foot et Gianluigi Buffon qui n'a jamais eu peur des mots.

programme.title: Invincible
programme.desc: Aucun pilote de F1 n'a dominé la scène du sport automobile comme Michael Schumacher, qui a remporté cinq titres mondiaux consécutifs à partir de 2000.

programme.title: National Icons
programme.desc: Ce programme mets en lumière et compare les performances des plus grands athlètes du passé et d'aujourd'hui.

programme.title: Clubland

programme.title: Clubland
programme.desc: Clubland rend hommage aux meilleurs clubs, aux meilleurs joueurs et aux plus grands supporters au monde.

programme.title: National Icons
programme.desc: Dans ce choc des icônes du football américain: deux légendes du quart-arrière, Joe Montana contre Tom Brady; les ailiers rapprochés Rob Gronkowski contre Greg Olsen et les demi-arrières connus pour leur vitesse et leur puissance Adrian Peterson.

programme.title: Star Block Workout
programme.desc: De Londres à Paris en passant par Johannesburg, Terroll Lewis, alias Boost, parcourt le monde pour faire découvrir sa discipline le Block Workout.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E26 The Deadly Wait Just released from prison, Dan Maury comes to North Fork in search of Marshal Micah Torrance, who helped get him locked up. Torrance carries a shotgun everywhere he goes, but Maury plans to wait him out.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E27 The Wrong Man A crooked marshal comes to North Fork looking for a wanted man. He finds a man fitting the futitive's description. He deliberately kills the wrong man to collect the bounty and then blackmails the real outlaw, who wants to keep his past hidden.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E28 The Challenge An escaped killer wants to prove he hasn't lost his nerve when he holds up North Fork's General Store and takes Marshal Micah Torrance hostage. He provokes the town to try to face him, but only Lucas is strong enough to rise up to his challenge.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E18 Dead to Rights Cheyenne goes on the hunt for his partner when he doesn't return from a private business trip. He leaves to hunt for him and learns that he is wounded and in jail. Later, Cheyenne deals with an estate and lawyer.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E19 Noose at Noon With his friend, Jim O'Neil's hanging scheduled for the next day, Cheyenne visits him in Texas. Jim refuses to tell Cheyenne any details, but Cheyenne uncovers the missing clue that prevents his innocent friend's hanging.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E2 Put a Ring on It When an infection threatens the herd, Bubba, Cody and Booger have to act fast. They enlist the help of young veterinary student Dakota to doctor the cows and keep the virus from spreading. Cody helps Misty take the first step towards starting her cattle business. The cowboys decide to build an office for the company, but Bubba throws a wrench into the plan when he's called to Mississippi to visit Kaley's parents. Bubba's in-laws pressure him to take a hard look at his future while Booger works up the nerve to pop the question and start a future with Jaclyn.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E3 Tradition vs. Technology A routine job turns tough when the cowboys struggle to wrangle the herd across a highway, sparking Cody's idea to use GPS devices so they can easily find cattle in the pasture. Bubba hides a cow in the woods and Booger challenges Cody to prove GPS technology beats traditional methods. Misty and Kaley help Jaclyn find the perfect wedding dress while Bubba fails to fit into his tuxedo pants, prompting Booger and Cody to put him on a weight-loss regimen. Cody writes a song in honor of Booger's wedding and surprises Misty with a trailer for her new cattle business.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E19 Face of Yesterday Lucas thinks he has seen a ghost when he comes face-to-face with Simon Lee, a young man who looks exactly like a Confederate officer he killed during the Civil War. Simon Lee is fast with a gun, and provokes Lucas into a life and death situation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E22 Closer Than a Brother Marshal Micah Torrance loses his confidence in his job of authority and begins drinking again after an old enemy from the past terrorizes him. When Lucas learns of the situation, he invites the man to North Fork and convinces Micah to face his fears.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E7 Molly's Choice A young Jim Bridger helps a Shoshone woman escape the clutches of her abusive husband. As Bridger squares off against the frontier ruffian and his henchmen, he soon realizes that the woman he is helping is none other than the legendary Sacajawea.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Snakeroot Cure When a young girl is bitten by a rattlesnake, mountain man Jim Bridger finds himself in a race against time to save her arm and keep her alive as he desperately searches the wilderness for a medicinal plant that once saved the life of his friend.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E1 Bat Masterson to the Rescue Now without a badge, former lawman Bat Masterson finds himself powerless to help an old friend whose brother has been falsely imprisoned. An overreaching sheriff is intent on seeing the brother hang, so Bat hatches a plan to bust him out of jail.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E11 Al Jennings and the Legend of Dick West Tired of his boring life, attorney Al Jennings dreams of the adventures he reads in dime novels. After a chance encounter with Dick West, Jennings joins the outlaw's gang and learns that a life of crime isn't as glamorous as he thought it would be.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E4 Mason & Dixon: Trailblazing Surveyors English astronomers Charles Mason and Jeremiah Dixon brave deadly terrain and hostile Native Americans to resolve a border dispute in Colonial America. With science and courage, they survey their famous Mason-Dixon Line with pinpoint accuracy.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S1 E3 Friendship the Hard Way With only eight cowboys left, the competition takes a dangerous turn as the contestants compete in a challenge with a raging bull to win the immunity belt buckle. Mayhem ensues, and one of the cowboys finds himself in a life-threatening situation. After a long talk, the two feuding cowboys realize the error or their ways and bury the hatchet. During the team challenge a steer escapes, and while most of the contestants try to correct their mistake, a few of them sit on the sidelines instead of helping their fellow teammates. Trace is left questioning their commitment to the competition. A female competitor refuses to criticize her teammates, which puts her in the hot seat and in danger of going home.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E17 Bulldog College student, Ambrose Bulldog Merriweather, comes to Sweetwater. He wants to meet his Western idol, Jimmy Hickok. However, unbeknownst to him, the Pony Express ownership's plans could get him into trouble and put all of the riders in danger.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E25 One Went to Denver Tom Birch, an old childhood friend, comes to visit Lucas unexpectedly. Birch promises he is just passing through on his way to Denver. But Lucas soon finds out about a plot to rob the North Fork Bank and must choose between friendship and justice.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E26 The Deadly Wait Just released from prison, Dan Maury comes to North Fork in search of Marshal Micah Torrance, who helped get him locked up. Torrance carries a shotgun everywhere he goes, but Maury plans to wait him out.

programme.desc: S1 E27 The Wrong Man A crooked marshal comes to North Fork looking for a wanted man. He finds a man fitting the futitive's description. He deliberately kills the wrong man to collect the bounty and then blackmails the real outlaw, who wants to keep his past hidden.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E19 Noose at Noon With his friend, Jim O'Neil's hanging scheduled for the next day, Cheyenne visits him in Texas. Jim refuses to tell Cheyenne any details, but Cheyenne uncovers the missing clue that prevents his innocent friend's hanging.

programme.title: War of the Wildcats
programme.desc: During the early days of the Oklahoma oil boom, a greedy, self-assured oilman and a quiet, yet determined cowboy fight for the rights to oil on Indian land. All the while a pretty schoolteacher steals both men's hearts.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E1 Waste Part 1 Micah, Lucas, and Mark are lost and fear they have crossed into dangerous Mexican territory. Their fears become reality when they stumble upon a ghost town and bandits take them prisoner. When Lucas sees Micah being tortured, he must act quickly.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E2 Waste Part 2 After Mexican bandits capture and hold Micah, Lucas, and Mark in a ghost town, Lucas devises a plan that will hopefully lead to freedom. Later, Lucas helps the wife of a bandit give birth, and the bandits finally release them.

programme.title: Legends of the Pony Express
programme.desc: Heroic Pony Express riders and station keepers face deadly terrain, hostile Native Americans, and dangerous outlaws to deliver vital mail across the untamed frontier. Their life-and-death adventures unite the country and become the stuff of legends.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E9 The Trials of Temple Houston Temple Houston, flamboyant son of Sam Houston, works hard to live up to his famous name as a top attorney in the Oklahoma Territory. But his flair for showmanship annoys his courtroom rivals, the Jennings brothers, and the feud erupts into bloodshed.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E12 Annie Oakley & Buffalo Bill's Wild West Showdown When Buffalo Bill adds female sharpshooter Lillian Smith to his Wild West show, it jeopardizes his relationship with the show's current star, Annie Oakley. As the rivalry between Annie and Lillian escalates, the future of the show is put at risk.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E4 Mason & Dixon: Trailblazing Surveyors English astronomers Charles Mason and Jeremiah Dixon brave deadly terrain and hostile Native Americans to resolve a border dispute in Colonial America. With science and courage, they survey their famous Mason-Dixon Line with pinpoint accuracy.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E17 Bulldog College student, Ambrose Bulldog Merriweather, comes to Sweetwater. He wants to meet his Western idol, Jimmy Hickok. However, unbeknownst to him, the Pony Express ownership's plans could get him into trouble and put all of the riders in danger.

programme.title: The Gatling Gun
programme.desc: An Apache warrior chief is willing to offer gold, and even sacrifice some of his men, to get his hands on Richard J. Gatling's powerful invention. It's up to a cavalry lieutenant, his scout, and a tough rancher to end the chief's deadly ambition.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: When a former Army officer accidentally kills a woman's young son, he offers to escort the grieving mother through dangerous Indian territory on the way to lay the boy to rest at the family homestead.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E32 Meeting at Midnight Lucas' old Army buddy, Tom Benton, comes to North Fork raising a ruckus. Micah arrests him and Lucas bails him out. Benton, an undercover federal agent, wants to stay in jail to hopefully infiltrate a gang of bank robbers.

programme.title: War of the Wildcats
programme.desc: During the early days of the Oklahoma oil boom, a greedy, self-assured oilman and a quiet, yet determined cowboy fight for the rights to oil on Indian land. All the while a pretty schoolteacher steals both men's hearts.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E19 Face of Yesterday Lucas thinks he has seen a ghost when he comes face-to-face with Simon Lee, a young man who looks exactly like a Confederate officer he killed during the Civil War. Simon Lee is fast with a gun, and provokes Lucas into a life and death situation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E22 Closer Than a Brother Marshal Micah Torrance loses his confidence in his job of authority and begins drinking again after an old enemy from the past terrorizes him. When Lucas learns of the situation, he invites the man to North Fork and convinces Micah to face his fears.

programme.title: Legends of the Pony Express
programme.desc: Heroic Pony Express riders and station keepers face deadly terrain, hostile Native Americans, and dangerous outlaws to deliver vital mail across the untamed frontier. Their life-and-death adventures unite the country and become the stuff of legends.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E9 The Trials of Temple Houston Temple Houston, flamboyant son of Sam Houston, works hard to live up to his famous name as a top attorney in the Oklahoma Territory. But his flair for showmanship annoys his courtroom rivals, the Jennings brothers, and the feud erupts into bloodshed.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E12 Annie Oakley & Buffalo Bill's Wild West Showdown When Buffalo Bill adds female sharpshooter Lillian Smith to his Wild West show, it jeopardizes his relationship with the show's current star, Annie Oakley. As the rivalry between Annie and Lillian escalates, the future of the show is put at risk.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E4 Mason & Dixon: Trailblazing Surveyors English astronomers Charles Mason and Jeremiah Dixon brave deadly terrain and hostile Native Americans to resolve a border dispute in Colonial America. With science and courage, they survey their famous Mason-Dixon Line with pinpoint accuracy.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S1 E3 Friendship the Hard Way With only eight cowboys left, the competition takes a dangerous turn as the contestants compete in a challenge with a raging bull to win the immunity belt buckle. Mayhem ensues, and one of the cowboys finds himself in a life-threatening situation. After a long talk, the two feuding cowboys realize the error or their ways and bury the hatchet. During the team challenge a steer escapes, and while most of the contestants try to correct their mistake, a few of them sit on the sidelines instead of helping their fellow teammates. Trace is left questioning their commitment to the competition. A female competitor refuses to criticize her teammates, which puts her in the hot seat and in danger of going home.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E17 Bulldog College student, Ambrose Bulldog Merriweather, comes to Sweetwater. He wants to meet his Western idol, Jimmy Hickok. However, unbeknownst to him, the Pony Express ownership's plans could get him into trouble and put all of the riders in danger.

programme.title: The Gatling Gun
programme.desc: An Apache warrior chief is willing to offer gold, and even sacrifice some of his men, to get his hands on Richard J. Gatling's powerful invention. It's up to a cavalry lieutenant, his scout, and a tough rancher to end the chief's deadly ambition.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: When a former Army officer accidentally kills a woman's young son, he offers to escort the grieving mother through dangerous Indian territory on the way to lay the boy to rest at the family homestead.

programme.title: The Warrant
programme.desc: Sheriff John Breaker and his son, Cal, reunite after the Civil War to track down a fellow veteran, now a notorious gang leader. Their mission turns dangerous when they find themselves caught between their former friend's outlaw gang and the vigilantes who are taking the law into their own hands. Starring Neal McDonough (Yellowstone, Captain America), Casper Van Dien (Starship Troopers, Tarzan), Steven R. McQueen (The Vampire Diaries, Chicago Fire), and Annabeth Gish (X-Files, The Haunting of Hill House).

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E1 Waste Part 1 Micah, Lucas, and Mark are lost and fear they have crossed into dangerous Mexican territory. Their fears become reality when they stumble upon a ghost town and bandits take them prisoner. When Lucas sees Micah being tortured, he must act quickly.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E2 Waste Part 2 After Mexican bandits capture and hold Micah, Lucas, and Mark in a ghost town, Lucas devises a plan that will hopefully lead to freedom. Later, Lucas helps the wife of a bandit give birth, and the bandits finally release them.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E3 Lou Mallory Lou Mallory, a beautiful red-headed lady, arrives in North Fork and quickly buys property, including Milly Scott's general store. Lucas learns she is quite the businesswoman, until she gets into trouble.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E4 Quiet Night, Deadly Night A stagecoach arrives in North Fork carrying two women, one of whom is gravely ill. Doc Burrage believes it's smallpox. Lou Mallory, Lucas, and both passengers quarantine alongside with another rider, Lee Coyle, a dangerous outlaw.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S4 E2 Jim Beckwourth: The Long Ride Jim Beckwourth lives a life of adventure as a trapper, trader and adopted member of the Crow tribe. When America goes to war, Beckwourth becomes an army dispatch rider, a job that puts him and a young greenhorn on a collision course with the Pawnee.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E2 Bass Reeves: A Father's Justice After a man murders his wife in a jealous rage and goes on the run, local lawmen are stunned when legendary Marshal Bass Reeves accepts responsibility for bringing the killer to justice...because the murderer is none other than Reeves' own son.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S4 E10 Willie Kennard Makes His Mark in History Under siege by gunslingers, the gold mining town of Yankee Hill runs a newspaper advertisement to find a new marshal. Former slave and Union soldier Willie Kennard answers the ad, but he faces prejudice and doubt as he works to restore law and order.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S5 E10 The Frightened Town A gang of disorderly cowhands take over the town of Kingsburg. Fear grips the townspeople. The men try to create a disturbance to cover up a bank robbery. Cheyenne, who is traveling with them, steps in to support the marshal.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E19 The Spoiler An elderly couple move to North Fork and settle down under a false name to keep the town from knowing they are parents of a vicious killer on the loose. However, their plan fails when their son shows up and causes chaos.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E20 Heller A teenage girl named Heller and her brother are abused by her drunken stepfather. The town becomes aware after Heller is caught stealing from the general store. The children plan the drunk's demise as the cruelty continues. Lucas steps in to help.

programme.title: Black Fox
programme.desc: A former slave and his white blood brother have moved their families from the Carolinas to Texas. When the Civil War begins, their settlement is left unprotected from hostile Indian tribes and the former slave may be the only hope for peace.

programme.title: Black Fox: The Price of Peace
programme.desc: A Texas woman falls in love with a Kiowa brave, and chooses to remain with him rather than return to her demanding and abusive husband. Driven by bitterness and rage, the husband soon forms a hunting party set on recapturing his bride, at any price.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S4 E12 The High Country Two mountain men, Ambrose and Gorwin, come to the McCain Ranch. Ambrose is captivated by Lucas' rifle but Lucas won't trade it. After Gorwin is killed trying to steal it, the family holds Lucas accountable.

programme.title: The Warrant
programme.desc: Sheriff John Breaker and his son, Cal, reunite after the Civil War to track down a fellow veteran, now a notorious gang leader. Their mission turns dangerous when they find themselves caught between their former friend's outlaw gang and the vigilantes who are taking the law into their own hands. Starring Neal McDonough (Yellowstone, Captain America), Casper Van Dien (Starship Troopers, Tarzan), Steven R. McQueen (The Vampire Diaries, Chicago Fire), and Annabeth Gish (X-Files, The Haunting of Hill House).

programme.desc: S2 E20 Heller A teenage girl named Heller and her brother are abused by her drunken stepfather. The town becomes aware after Heller is caught stealing from the general store. The children plan the drunk's demise as the cruelty continues. Lucas steps in to help.

programme.title: Black Fox: The Price of Peace
programme.desc: A Texas woman falls in love with a Kiowa brave, and chooses to remain with him rather than return to her demanding and abusive husband. Driven by bitterness and rage, the husband soon forms a hunting party set on recapturing his bride, at any price.

programme.title: Christmas in the Pines
programme.desc: Ariel thought she bought the perfect cottage for Christmas, but, through a mix-up, two offers were accepted on the house. As she battles Mark, the other buyer, Ariel realizes she may not only have found the perfect house, but also the perfect love.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S3 E6 Survivors Buck continues to grieve over Ike's untimely death. Meanwhile, Cody falls for Julia, the widow of a gunrunner who has a young son named Danny. Cody helps them both adjust to life on their own.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E19 And the Devil Makes Five While returning from a hunting trip, Lucas and Mark meet Marshal Micah Torrance who is escorting prisoner Scully Potter to trial. Later in camp, Lucas' life is suddenly in danger when a rattlesnake is found in his bedroll. Potter tries to escape.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E20 End of the Hunt Lucas wants to kill an old enemy, Reef Jackson, who is coming to North Fork. In the past, Jackson shot Lucas in the back and tried to steal his wife. Micah puts Lucas in jail to stop him from getting his revenge. Meanwhile, Mark wants to bag an elk.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E11 Battle Beneath the Mountain For months, a thin wall of rock is all that keeps the peace between two rival silver mining companies 300 feet below the Idaho desert. When the barrier is finally breached, pickaxes give way to pistols and rifles, and the miners battle for five days.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S2 E7 Doc Susie Goes Underground After the suspicious death of a tunnel worker, and unconvincing answers from the project's lead engineer, Doc Susie goes on a covert mission to find out what happened. Deep underground, she finds her own life in peril when she's trapped by a cave-in.

programme.title: Freedom on the Range
programme.desc: S1 E1 From brave lawmen to rugged cowboys, discover the untold stories of African Americans' cultural significance in the Old West.

programme.title: Christmas in Maple Hills
programme.desc: Valerie Warrick is shocked to learn that her family's land is registered to a mysterious D Property Company. Days before Christmas, she teams with a handsome travelling doctor to unravel the mystery to her family's past and her heart's future.

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: A Colorado rancher contends with his two sons, one biological and the other adopted, who are fighting over control of the massive family property. Which brother will come out on top in this family battle for cash and cattle?

programme.title: Sitting Bull
programme.desc: A U.S. Cavalry officer begins to understand the plight of the Sioux and arranges a meeting between Chief Sitting Bull and President Grant.

programme.title: Christmas in the Pines
programme.desc: Ariel thought she bought the perfect cottage for Christmas, but, through a mix-up, two offers were accepted on the house. As she battles Mark, the other buyer, Ariel realizes she may not only have found the perfect house, but also the perfect love.

programme.desc: S3 E6 Survivors Buck continues to grieve over Ike's untimely death. Meanwhile, Cody falls for Julia, the widow of a gunrunner who has a young son named Danny. Cody helps them both adjust to life on their own.

programme.title: Freedom on the Range
programme.desc: S1 E1 From brave lawmen to rugged cowboys, discover the untold stories of African Americans' cultural significance in the Old West.

programme.title: Christmas in Maple Hills
programme.desc: Valerie Warrick is shocked to learn that her family's land is registered to a mysterious D Property Company. Days before Christmas, she teams with a handsome travelling doctor to unravel the mystery to her family's past and her heart's future.

programme.title: Vengeance Valley
programme.desc: A Colorado rancher contends with his two sons, one biological and the other adopted, who are fighting over control of the massive family property. Which brother will come out on top in this family battle for cash and cattle?

programme.title: Sitting Bull
programme.desc: A U.S. Cavalry officer begins to understand the plight of the Sioux and arranges a meeting between Chief Sitting Bull and President Grant.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E4 Bulls on the Beach While the cowboys are sorting the herd, Cody suffers a close call on the job that sets off a string of bad luck as he plans his annual rodeo, Bulls on the Beach. He struggles to impress a potential sponsor and the entire event is put in jeopardy when the bulls don't arrive as scheduled. Bubba heads to Mississippi to work for his father-in-law and try his hand at office life. Booger and Jaclyn enjoy learning the first dance for their wedding, but Booger finds himself awkwardly out of place as the only man at their bridal shower!

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E5 Saddle Up or Settle Down? Bubba, Cody, and Booger have their work cut out for them removing a dangerous cow from a local rancher's herd. Bubba continues to shadow his father-in-law, making his first business pitch to a potential client. He begins to realize a life in Mississippi could prove to be very lucrative, but he isn't ready to hang up his spurs just yet. Misty convinces Cody to let her have his ranch horse for her new cattle business, requiring Cody and Booger to train a replacement colt for Cody. Booger and Jaclyn find wedding planning to be more troublesome than they anticipated.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E20 The Wyoming Story Part 1 After Lucas' herd is wiped out by disease, he takes a job as an undercover agent for the U.S. government to raise money for new cattle. He travels to Wyoming to learn how renegade Cheyenne Indians are getting rifles illegally.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E21 The Wyoming Story Part 2 Lucas continues his investigation in Wyoming and makes contact with the local Indian agent, the source of the illegal gun-running operation. However, Lucas' life is put in danger when the town drunk reveals his true identity.

programme.title: County Line
programme.desc: When his best friend, Sheriff Clint Thorne (Jeff Fahey, Texas Rising, Justified), is brutally gunned down, former neighboring county sheriff, Alden Rockwell (Tom Wopat, The Dukes Of Hazzard, Longmire) is left with many questions and no answers. After the investigation stalls and his replacement, Sheriff Preston (Grant Goodeve, Eight is Enough, Dynasty) turns a blind eye, Alden takes the case into his own hands. Uncovering a web of crime, deceit, and corruption that spreads through two counties, Alden is caught in a deadly criminal network with no backup, no badge, and local diner owner, Maddie (Patricia Richardson, Home Improvement, The West Wing) as his only ally. Seeking justice at any cost, Alden must find out who's behind this criminal enterprise, even if some lines must be crossed.

programme.title: The Proud Rebel
programme.desc: A Confederate veteran battles prejudice and greed as he helps a woman save her ranch from a land grab, while searching for a cure for his mute son.

programme.title: Buffalo Keepers
programme.desc: S1 E1 Today, the buffalo is the quintessential symbol of strength, freedom, and the unspoiled American West. But in the late 1800s, the nation's buffalo were nearly wiped out by ruthless hide hunters. Those majestic herds, which once numbered in the tens of millions, were down to less than 500 animals. This is the story of the handful of determined men and women who mobilized to save the ones that were left in a last-ditch effort to stave off extinction. Ranchers like Charles and Mary Ann Goodnight rescued orphaned buffalo calves and built small herds. Former buffalo hunters like Buffalo Bill helped build public sympathy. And politicians like Theodore Roosevelt helped pass laws to protect the remaining animals. The effort would be a generational one, with buffalo herds carefully tended, bred, and passed down to new stewards when their old protectors passed away. Thanks to their efforts, there are an estimated 500,000 buffalo thundering across America's grasslands once again.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E29 The Hawk Mark finally captures a hawk that he has been chasing but he encounters a rattlesnake in the process. When a stranger quickly comes to his rescue, a grateful Mark invites the man to the ranch, unaware he is a fugitive on the run from the law.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E30 Three-Legged Terror A troubled 18-year-old named Johnny Clover ransacks the North Fork Schoolhouse, stealing art supplies. Lucas later tries to help Johnny, but he lives with a controlling uncle who proves to be difficult to deal with.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E31 The Angry Man A neighboring rancher's son is seriously injured in an accident. With the young man's condition getting worse, Lucas learns the rancher won't take his son to the doctor since he feels his wife died from poor treatment.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E32 The Woman The residents force Miss Adams, the North Fork schoolteacher, to leave her job because they feel she is too progressive for supporting women's right to vote. Lucas gets involved and he learns that lies have been circulated by a past student.

programme.title: Blind Spot
programme.desc: Cheyenne rides into a small cotton town to pick up a friend's son to try to reunite a family bitterly divided by the Civil War. He soon battles hatred and greed by a vigilante gang that is holding the town captive.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E4 Bulls on the Beach While the cowboys are sorting the herd, Cody suffers a close call on the job that sets off a string of bad luck as he plans his annual rodeo, Bulls on the Beach. programme.title: Blind Spot
programme.desc: Cheyenne rides into a small cotton town to pick up a friend's son to try to reunite a family bitterly divided by the Civil War. He soon battles hatred and greed by a vigilante gang that is holding the town captive.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E6 Tying the Knot When a cow goes rogue and plants herself in the middle of a pond, Booger and Cody rely on their roping skills to pull her out. Bubba is feeling pressured to give up the cowboy way of life when he is offered the opportunity to take over the management of his father-in-law's company. Misty attempts to buy cows from a notoriously tough trading-cattle owner, who also happens to be her brother-in-law. Booger and Jaclyn plan the finishing touches for their wedding, and everyone joins together to celebrate their special day.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E7 All for One or One for Himself Booger and Jaclyn enjoy a romantic beach getaway for their honeymoon and discuss their new life together. Misty and Cody contemplate a business partnership. To celebrate their anniversary, Bubba and Kaley take a trip to Mississippi, and Bubba begins to warm up to the idea of relocating there permanently to work with Kaley's father. However, Bubba's reluctance to tell Booger and Cody about the job offer from his father-in-law causes tensions to boil over, leaving the future of their business, and their friendship, uncertain.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E23 The Lost Treasure of Canyon Town On the way home to North Fork, Lucas, Micah, and Mark take a detour to Micah's hometown. A thriving mining town years ago, it is now a ghost town except for Mr. Newman and his son who still live there. Something is amiss, and a mystery is revealed.

programme.title: The Wall
programme.desc: Everyday people battle a variety of trivia questions and a 40-foot wall for a chance to win millions of dollars. Each pair of deserving contestants, from siblings to spouses to best friends, has a plan to use the life-changing winnings for good things. But defeating the wall is no easy feat. Executive Producer LeBron James' game is a true test of both knowledge and poise. With momentary changes between fortune and failure, the outcome is as unpredictable as the bounce of the ball.

programme.title: Press Your Luck
programme.desc: Three contestants compete against one another in a game of wits and strategy, answering questions to earn spins on the Big Board. The stakes get even higher when the contestants get the chance to use their spins to win cash and prizes while trying to avoid the WHAMMY, who could take all of their winnings and leave them with nothing. The winning contestant moves on to the bonus round to face the WHAMMY in a final battle for the chance to win a fortune.

programme.title: Family Feud

programme.title: Chain Reaction

programme.title: Catch 21
programme.desc: Players must combine their trivia talent with card-counting skills to win at "Catch 21." Alfonso Ribiero hosts.

programme.title: Cash Cab
programme.desc: In this offbeat game show, players picked up in the Cash Cab have to answer trivia questions with mounting cash values before they reach their destination in order to win. If a player answers incorrectly three times, he is kicked out of the cab without any money. Help options include a Mobile Shout-Out (phone call) and Street Shout-Out (asking a stranger on the street). Once the player reaches his destination, he can leave the cab with his winnings, if any, or risk them on a more difficult question. A correct final answer doubles his winnings; an incorrect answer means he leaves the cab with no money at all. Comic Ben Bailey takes the cab's wheel as host.

programme.title: Cash Cab

programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid
programme.desc: Two teams of two compete in a word-association game. Each contestant gets a celebrity partner, and one partner provides clues to the other about six mystery words, leaving the other to guess those words before the time runs out. The team with the most points gets to play in the winners circle, where the top prize is $100,000. Michael Strahan hosts.

programme.title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
programme.desc: Contestants answer increasingly difficult multiple-choice questions to win cash - up to $1 million, or even more in certain episodes. Along the way, contestants have "lifelines" they can use to help them answer the questions, including asking the studio audience for help.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: A contestant must choose from 26 sealed briefcases containing a marker for various amounts of cash from one penny to $1 million. The player then eliminates the remaining 25 cases one by one. The chosen ones are opened and the amount of money inside revealed. After several cases are opened, the player is tempted by the Banker to accept an offer of cash in exchange for not continuing the game and possibly winning a larger sum of money.

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune
programme.desc: Contestants guess hidden phrases by guessing letters one at a time. Contestants win money or prizes, as determined by a spin of the wheel, for each correct consonant they guess. But they have to pay to see what vowels are in a puzzle. The contestant that has amassed the most winnings at the end of a game goes on to play the bonus round, in which the player can win even more - prizes frequently seen in the bonus round include automobiles, vacations and more cash.

programme.title: Jeopardy!
programme.desc: "Jeopardy!" is a classic game show - with a twist. The answers are given first, and the contestants supply the questions. Three contestants, including the previous show's champion, compete in six categories and in three rounds (with each round's "answers" being worth more prize money). In the third round, "Final Jeopardy," the contestants can name their own jackpot - as long as it's within the amount of money they've already earned. If a player finishes the second round with zero dollars, they are eliminated from "Final Jeopardy." The first version of "Jeopardy!," which aired from 1964 to 1975 on NBC, was hosted by Art Fleming. Alex Trebek is the current host; he began with the program in 1984 (at the start of its syndicated run).

programme.title: Master Minds
programme.desc: Three challengers take on some of the great minds in trivia in a showdown of smarts and strategy; the last contestant standing will face off against the highest scoring Master Mind in a head-to-head battle.

programme.title: America Says
programme.desc: Game show series have been making a comeback in television, and media and "America Says" is no exception. This program is following in the footsteps of the popular mobile app game "HQ Trivia." The network is planning its own spin on the game show, and Fran Shea, evp, programming and marketing, says she "has been studying the GSN audience and prepared a slate of new shows that reflect what it wants: family-friendly, fun, escapist television." In "America Says," two teams face off to guess Americans' responses to questions covering a variety of topics. Michael Higgins is the host.

programme.title: Flip Side
programme.desc: The hilarious new survey game show explores answers to questions from differing perspectives; host Jaleel White.

programme.title: Chain Reaction
programme.desc: This incarnation of the word-association game show that dates back, in various forms, to the early '80s is hosted by radio personality Mike Catherwood ("Loveline"). The premise is simple: two teams try to complete chains of seven words. The first and last word in each chain are revealed, and the contestants must guess the missing words, with one letter being revealed each turn. Each link in the chain forms a compound word or phrase with the word before and/or after it. Teams earn money for each word they guess correctly, and the team with the most money at the end of the game goes on to the bonus round, dubbed the Super Chain, for a chance to add an additional $5,000 to the total the team won during the main part of the game.

programme.title: Beat the Bridge
programme.desc: An interactive bridge dares players to cross by stepping on the right answers to challenging trivia questions; each step forward puts money in the team's bank, with bonus money for each successful crossing.

programme.title: Tic Tac Dough

programme.title: Bingo Blitz

programme.title: The Wall
programme.desc: Everyday people battle a variety of trivia questions and a 40-foot wall for a chance to win millions of dollars. Each pair of deserving contestants, from siblings to spouses to best friends, has a plan to use the life-changing winnings for good things. But defeating the wall is no easy feat. Executive Producer LeBron James' game is a true test of both knowledge and poise. With momentary changes between fortune and failure, the outcome is as unpredictable as the bounce of the ball.

programme.title: Press Your Luck

The winning contestant moves on to the bonus round to face the WHAMMY in a final battle for the chance to win a fortune.

programme.title: Jeopardy!
programme.desc: "Jeopardy!" is a classic game show - with a twist. The answers are given first, and the contestants supply the questions. Three contestants, including the previous show's champion, compete in six categories and in three rounds (with each round's "answers" being worth more prize money). In the third round, "Final Jeopardy," the contestants can name their own jackpot - as long as it's within the amount of money they've already earned. If a player finishes the second round with zero dollars, they are eliminated from "Final Jeopardy." The first version of "Jeopardy!," which aired from 1964 to 1975 on NBC, was hosted by Art Fleming. Alex Trebek is the current host; he began with the program in 1984 (at the start of its syndicated run).

programme.title: America Says
programme.desc: Game show series have been making a comeback in television, and media and "America Says" is no exception. This program is following in the footsteps of the popular mobile app game "HQ Trivia." The network is planning its own spin on the game show, and Fran Shea, evp, programming and marketing, says she "has been studying the GSN audience and prepared a slate of new shows that reflect what it wants: family-friendly, fun, escapist television." In "America Says," two teams face off to guess Americans' responses to questions covering a variety of topics. Michael Higgins is the host.

programme.title: Tic Tac Dough

programme.title: Cash Cab
programme.desc: In this offbeat game show, players picked up in the Cash Cab have to answer trivia questions with mounting cash values before they reach their destination in order to win. If a player answers incorrectly three times, he is kicked out of the cab without any money. Help options include a Mobile Shout-Out (phone call) and Street Shout-Out (asking a stranger on the street). Once the player reaches his destination, he can leave the cab with his winnings, if any, or risk them on a more difficult question. A correct final answer doubles his winnings; an incorrect answer means he leaves the cab with no money at all. Comic Ben Bailey takes the cab's wheel as host.

programme.title: Match Game
programme.desc: Actor Alec Baldwin hosts - and executive produces - the newest iteration of the iconic panel game show in which four contestants try to match answers given by six celebrities to humorous and often risque fill-in-the-blank questions. The famous panelists range from quick-witted comics to stars of the stage and screen.

programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid
programme.desc: Two teams of two compete in a word-association game. Each contestant gets a celebrity partner, and one partner provides clues to the other about six mystery words, leaving the other to guess those words before the time runs out. The team with the most points gets to play in the winners circle, where the top prize is $100,000. Michael Strahan hosts.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Airing from 2005 to 2009 on NBC, the game show series returns to primetime TV with original host Howie Mandel. A contestant must choose from 26 sealed briefcases containing a marker for various amounts of cash - from one penny to $1 million. The player then eliminates the remaining 25 cases one by one. The chosen ones are opened and the amount of money inside revealed. After several cases are opened, the player is tempted by the Banker to accept an offer of cash in exchange for not continuing the game and possibly winning a larger sum of money.

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune
programme.desc: Contestants guess hidden phrases by guessing letters one at a time. Contestants win money or prizes, as determined by a spin of the wheel, for each correct consonant they guess. But they have to pay to see what vowels are in a puzzle. The contestant that has amassed the most winnings at the end of a game goes on to play the bonus round, in which the player can win even more - prizes frequently seen in the bonus round include automobiles, vacations and more cash.

programme.title: Flip Side
programme.desc: The hilarious new survey game show explores answers to questions from differing perspectives; host Jaleel White.

programme.title: Chain Reaction
programme.desc: This incarnation of the word-association game show that dates back, in various forms, to the early '80s is hosted by radio personality Mike Catherwood ("Loveline"). The premise is simple: two teams try to complete chains of seven words. The first and last word in each chain are revealed, and the contestants must guess the missing words, with one letter being revealed each turn. Each link in the chain forms a compound word or phrase with the word before and/or after it. Teams earn money for each word they guess correctly, and the team with the most money at the end of the game goes on to the bonus round, dubbed the Super Chain, for a chance to add an additional $5,000 to the total the team won during the main part of the game.

programme.title: Beat the Bridge
programme.desc: An interactive bridge dares players to cross by stepping on the right answers to challenging trivia questions; each step forward puts money in the team's bank, with bonus money for each successful crossing.

programme.desc: Everyday people battle a variety of trivia questions and a 40-foot wall for a chance to win millions of dollars. Executive Producer LeBron James' game is a true test of both knowledge and poise. With momentary changes between fortune and failure, the outcome is as unpredictable as the bounce of the ball.

programme.title: Cash Cab
programme.desc: In this offbeat game show, players picked up in the Cash Cab have to answer trivia questions with mounting cash values before they reach their destination in order to win. If a player answers incorrectly three times, he is kicked out of the cab without any money. Help options include a Mobile Shout-Out (phone call) and Street Shout-Out (asking a stranger on the street). Once the player reaches his destination, he can leave the cab with his winnings, if any, or risk them on a more difficult question. A correct final answer doubles his winnings; an incorrect answer means he leaves the cab with no money at all. Comic Ben Bailey takes the cab's wheel as host.

programme.title: The Wall
programme.desc: Everyday people battle a variety of trivia questions and a 40-foot wall for a chance to win millions of dollars. Each pair of deserving contestants, from siblings to spouses to best friends, has a plan to use the life-changing winnings for good things. But defeating the wall is no easy feat. Executive Producer LeBron James' game is a true test of both knowledge and poise. With momentary changes between fortune and failure, the outcome is as unpredictable as the bounce of the ball.

programme.title: Press Your Luck
programme.desc: Three contestants compete against one another in a game of wits and strategy, answering questions to earn spins on the Big Board. The stakes get even higher when the contestants get the chance to use their spins to win cash and prizes while trying to avoid the WHAMMY, who could take all of their winnings and leave them with nothing. The winning contestant moves on to the bonus round to face the WHAMMY in a final battle for the chance to win a fortune.

programme.title: Chain Reaction

programme.title: Chain Reaction

programme.title: Catch 21

programme.title: Catch 21
programme.desc: Players must combine their trivia talent with card-counting skills to win at "Catch 21." Alfonso Ribiero hosts.

programme.title: Cash Cab
programme.desc: In this offbeat game show, players picked up in the Cash Cab have to answer trivia questions with mounting cash values before they reach their destination in order to win. If a player answers incorrectly three times, he is kicked out of the cab without any money. Help options include a Mobile Shout-Out (phone call) and Street Shout-Out (asking a stranger on the street). Once the player reaches his destination, he can leave the cab with his winnings, if any, or risk them on a more difficult question. A correct final answer doubles his winnings; an incorrect answer means he leaves the cab with no money at all. Comic Ben Bailey takes the cab's wheel as host.

programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid
programme.desc: Two teams of two compete in a word-association game. Each contestant gets a celebrity partner, and one partner provides clues to the other about six mystery words, leaving the other to guess those words before the time runs out. The team with the most points gets to play in the winners circle, where the top prize is $100,000. Michael Strahan hosts.

programme.title: Who Wants to Be a Millionaire
programme.desc: Contestants answer increasingly difficult multiple-choice questions to win cash - up to $1 million, or even more in certain episodes. Along the way, contestants have "lifelines" they can use to help them answer the questions, including asking the studio audience for help.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: A contestant must choose from 26 sealed briefcases containing a marker for various amounts of cash from one penny to $1 million. The player then eliminates the remaining 25 cases one by one. The chosen ones are opened and the amount of money inside revealed. After several cases are opened, the player is tempted by the Banker to accept an offer of cash in exchange for not continuing the game and possibly winning a larger sum of money.

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune
programme.desc: Contestants guess hidden phrases by guessing letters one at a time. Contestants win money or prizes, as determined by a spin of the wheel, for each correct consonant they guess. But they have to pay to see what vowels are in a puzzle. The contestant that has amassed the most winnings at the end of a game goes on to play the bonus round, in which the player can win even more - prizes frequently seen in the bonus round include automobiles, vacations and more cash.

programme.title: Jeopardy!
programme.desc: "Jeopardy!" is a classic game show - with a twist. The answers are given first, and the contestants supply the questions. Three contestants, including the previous show's champion, compete in six categories and in three rounds (with each round's "answers" being worth more prize money). In the third round, "Final Jeopardy," the contestants can name their own jackpot - as long as it's within the amount of money they've already earned. If a player finishes the second round with zero dollars, they are eliminated from "Final Jeopardy." The first version of "Jeopardy!," which aired from 1964 to 1975 on NBC, was hosted by Art Fleming. Alex Trebek is the current host; he began with the program in 1984 (at the start of its syndicated run).

programme.title: Master Minds
programme.desc: Three challengers take on some of the great minds in trivia in a showdown of smarts and strategy; the last contestant standing will face off against the highest scoring Master Mind in a head-to-head battle.

programme.title: America Says
programme.desc: Game show series have been making a comeback in television, and media and "America Says" is no exception. This program is following in the footsteps of the popular mobile app game "HQ Trivia." The network is planning its own spin on the game show, and Fran Shea, evp, programming and marketing, says she "has been studying the GSN audience and prepared a slate of new shows that reflect what it wants: family-friendly, fun, escapist television." In "America Says," two teams face off to guess Americans' responses to questions covering a variety of topics. Michael Higgins is the host.

programme.title: Flip Side
programme.desc: The hilarious new survey game show explores answers to questions from differing perspectives; host Jaleel White.

programme.title: Chain Reaction
programme.desc: This incarnation of the word-association game show that dates back, in various forms, to the early '80s is hosted by radio personality Mike Catherwood ("Loveline"). The premise is simple: two teams try to complete chains of seven words. The first and last word in each chain are revealed, and the contestants must guess the missing words, with one letter being revealed each turn. Each link in the chain forms a compound word or phrase with the word before and/or after it. Teams earn money for each word they guess correctly, and the team with the most money at the end of the game goes on to the bonus round, dubbed the Super Chain, for a chance to add an additional $5,000 to the total the team won during the main part of the game.

programme.title: Beat the Bridge
programme.desc: An interactive bridge dares players to cross by stepping on the right answers to challenging trivia questions; each step forward puts money in the team's bank, with bonus money for each successful crossing.

programme.desc: Actor Alec Baldwin hosts - and executive produces - the newest iteration of the iconic panel game show in which four contestants try to match answers given by six celebrities to humorous and often risque fill-in-the-blank questions. The famous panelists range from quick-witted comics to stars of the stage and screen.

programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid
programme.desc: Two teams of two compete in a word-association game. Each contestant gets a celebrity partner, and one partner provides clues to the other about six mystery words, leaving the other to guess those words before the time runs out. The team with the most points gets to play in the winners circle, where the top prize is $100,000. Michael Strahan hosts.

programme.title: Deal or No Deal
programme.desc: Airing from 2005 to 2009 on NBC, the game show series returns to primetime TV with original host Howie Mandel. A contestant must choose from 26 sealed briefcases containing a marker for various amounts of cash - from one penny to $1 million. The player then eliminates the remaining 25 cases one by one. The chosen ones are opened and the amount of money inside revealed. After several cases are opened, the player is tempted by the Banker to accept an offer of cash in exchange for not continuing the game and possibly winning a larger sum of money.

programme.title: Jeopardy!
programme.desc: "Jeopardy!" is a classic game show - with a twist. The answers are given first, and the contestants supply the questions. Three contestants, including the previous show's champion, compete in six categories and in three rounds (with each round's "answers" being worth more prize money). In the third round, "Final Jeopardy," the contestants can name their own jackpot - as long as it's within the amount of money they've already earned. If a player finishes the second round with zero dollars, they are eliminated from "Final Jeopardy." The first version of "Jeopardy!," which aired from 1964 to 1975 on NBC, was hosted by Art Fleming. Alex Trebek is the current host; he began with the program in 1984 (at the start of its syndicated run).

programme.title: America Says
programme.desc: Game show series have been making a comeback in television, and media and "America Says" is no exception. This program is following in the footsteps of the popular mobile app game "HQ Trivia." The network is planning its own spin on the game show, and Fran Shea, evp, programming and marketing, says she "has been studying the GSN audience and prepared a slate of new shows that reflect what it wants: family-friendly, fun, escapist television." In "America Says," two teams face off to guess Americans' responses to questions covering a variety of topics. Michael Higgins is the host.

programme.title: Tic Tac Dough

programme.title: Cash Cab
programme.desc: In this offbeat game show, players picked up in the Cash Cab have to answer trivia questions with mounting cash values before they reach their destination in order to win. If a player answers incorrectly three times, he is kicked out of the cab without any money. Help options include a Mobile Shout-Out (phone call) and Street Shout-Out (asking a stranger on the street). Once the player reaches his destination, he can leave the cab with his winnings, if any, or risk them on a more difficult question. A correct final answer doubles his winnings; an incorrect answer means he leaves the cab with no money at all. Comic Ben Bailey takes the cab's wheel as host.

programme.title: Wheel of Fortune
programme.desc: Contestants guess hidden phrases by guessing letters one at a time. Contestants win money or prizes, as determined by a spin of the wheel, for each correct consonant they guess. But they have to pay to see what vowels are in a puzzle. The contestant that has amassed the most winnings at the end of a game goes on to play the bonus round, in which the player can win even more - prizes frequently seen in the bonus round include automobiles, vacations and more cash.

programme.desc: This incarnation of the word-association game show that dates back, in various forms, to the early '80s is hosted by radio personality Mike Catherwood ("Loveline"). The premise is simple: two teams try to complete chains of seven words. The first and last word in each chain are revealed, and the contestants must guess the missing words, with one letter being revealed each turn. Each link in the chain forms a compound word or phrase with the word before and/or after it. Teams earn money for each word they guess correctly, and the team with the most money at the end of the game goes on to the bonus round, dubbed the Super Chain, for a chance to add an additional $5,000 to the total the team won during the main part of the game.

programme.title: Beat the Bridge
programme.desc: An interactive bridge dares players to cross by stepping on the right answers to challenging trivia questions; each step forward puts money in the team's bank, with bonus money for each successful crossing.

Executive Producer LeBron James' game is a true test of both knowledge and poise. With momentary changes between fortune and failure, the outcome is as unpredictable as the bounce of the ball.

programme.title: Press Your Luck

The winning contestant moves on to the bonus round to face the WHAMMY in a final battle for the chance to win a fortune.

programme.title: Cash Cab
programme.desc: In this offbeat game show, players picked up in the Cash Cab have to answer trivia questions with mounting cash values before they reach their destination in order to win. If a player answers incorrectly three times, he is kicked out of the cab without any money. Help options include a Mobile Shout-Out (phone call) and Street Shout-Out (asking a stranger on the street). Once the player reaches his destination, he can leave the cab with his winnings, if any, or risk them on a more difficult question. A correct final answer doubles his winnings; an incorrect answer means he leaves the cab with no money at all. Comic Ben Bailey takes the cab's wheel as host.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.desc: Ben Cartwright is the patriarch of an all-male Nevada ranching family. Set during and after the Civil War, "Bonanza" is the story of life on the family's thousand-acre spread, known as the Ponderosa, near Virginia City. Ben has his three sons, each with a different (and deceased) mother. Serious eldest son Adam hopes to follow in his father's footsteps; middle son Hoss is a gentle giant -- physically strong, but sometimes naive; and youngest son Little Joe is the most impetuous and romantic of the offspring.

programme.title: Cruising Israel

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E26 The Deadly Wait Just released from prison, Dan Maury comes to North Fork in search of Marshal Micah Torrance, who helped get him locked up. Torrance carries a shotgun everywhere he goes, but Maury plans to wait him out.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E27 The Wrong Man A crooked marshal comes to North Fork looking for a wanted man. He finds a man fitting the futitive's description. He deliberately kills the wrong man to collect the bounty and then blackmails the real outlaw, who wants to keep his past hidden.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E28 The Challenge An escaped killer wants to prove he hasn't lost his nerve when he holds up North Fork's General Store and takes Marshal Micah Torrance hostage. He provokes the town to try to face him, but only Lucas is strong enough to rise up to his challenge.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E18 Dead to Rights Cheyenne goes on the hunt for his partner when he doesn't return from a private business trip. He leaves to hunt for him and learns that he is wounded and in jail. Later, Cheyenne deals with an estate and lawyer.

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E19 Noose at Noon With his friend, Jim O'Neil's hanging scheduled for the next day, Cheyenne visits him in Texas. Jim refuses to tell Cheyenne any details, but Cheyenne uncovers the missing clue that prevents his innocent friend's hanging.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E2 Put a Ring on It When an infection threatens the herd, Bubba, Cody and Booger have to act fast. They enlist the help of young veterinary student Dakota to doctor the cows and keep the virus from spreading. Cody helps Misty take the first step towards starting her cattle business. The cowboys decide to build an office for the company, but Bubba throws a wrench into the plan when he's called to Mississippi to visit Kaley's parents. Bubba's in-laws pressure him to take a hard look at his future while Booger works up the nerve to pop the question and start a future with Jaclyn.

programme.title: The Cowboy Way
programme.desc: S2 E3 Tradition vs. Technology A routine job turns tough when the cowboys struggle to wrangle the herd across a highway, sparking Cody's idea to use GPS devices so they can easily find cattle in the pasture. Bubba hides a cow in the woods and Booger challenges Cody to prove GPS technology beats traditional methods. Misty and Kaley help Jaclyn find the perfect wedding dress while Bubba fails to fit into his tuxedo pants, prompting Booger and Cody to put him on a weight-loss regimen. Cody writes a song in honor of Booger's wedding and surprises Misty with a trailer for her new cattle business.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E19 Face of Yesterday Lucas thinks he has seen a ghost when he comes face-to-face with Simon Lee, a young man who looks exactly like a Confederate officer he killed during the Civil War. Simon Lee is fast with a gun, and provokes Lucas into a life and death situation.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S3 E22 Closer Than a Brother Marshal Micah Torrance loses his confidence in his job of authority and begins drinking again after an old enemy from the past terrorizes him. When Lucas learns of the situation, he invites the man to North Fork and convinces Micah to face his fears.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E7 Molly's Choice A young Jim Bridger helps a Shoshone woman escape the clutches of her abusive husband. As Bridger squares off against the frontier ruffian and his henchmen, he soon realizes that the woman he is helping is none other than the legendary Sacajawea.

programme.title: The Tall Tales of Jim Bridger
programme.desc: S1 E8 The Snakeroot Cure When a young girl is bitten by a rattlesnake, mountain man Jim Bridger finds himself in a race against time to save her arm and keep her alive as he desperately searches the wilderness for a medicinal plant that once saved the life of his friend.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E1 Bat Masterson to the Rescue Now without a badge, former lawman Bat Masterson finds himself powerless to help an old friend whose brother has been falsely imprisoned. An overreaching sheriff is intent on seeing the brother hang, so Bat hatches a plan to bust him out of jail.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E11 Al Jennings and the Legend of Dick West Tired of his boring life, attorney Al Jennings dreams of the adventures he reads in dime novels. After a chance encounter with Dick West, Jennings joins the outlaw's gang and learns that a life of crime isn't as glamorous as he thought it would be.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E4 Mason & Dixon: Trailblazing Surveyors English astronomers Charles Mason and Jeremiah Dixon brave deadly terrain and hostile Native Americans to resolve a border dispute in Colonial America. With science and courage, they survey their famous Mason-Dixon Line with pinpoint accuracy.

programme.title: Ultimate Cowboy Showdown
programme.desc: S1 E3 Friendship the Hard Way With only eight cowboys left, the competition takes a dangerous turn as the contestants compete in a challenge with a raging bull to win the immunity belt buckle. Mayhem ensues, and one of the cowboys finds himself in a life-threatening situation. After a long talk, the two feuding cowboys realize the error or their ways and bury the hatchet. During the team challenge a steer escapes, and while most of the contestants try to correct their mistake, a few of them sit on the sidelines instead of helping their fellow teammates. Trace is left questioning their commitment to the competition. A female competitor refuses to criticize her teammates, which puts her in the hot seat and in danger of going home.

programme.title: The Young Riders
programme.desc: S1 E17 Bulldog College student, Ambrose Bulldog Merriweather, comes to Sweetwater. He wants to meet his Western idol, Jimmy Hickok. However, unbeknownst to him, the Pony Express ownership's plans could get him into trouble and put all of the riders in danger.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E25 One Went to Denver Tom Birch, an old childhood friend, comes to visit Lucas unexpectedly. Birch promises he is just passing through on his way to Denver. But Lucas soon finds out about a plot to rob the North Fork Bank and must choose between friendship and justice.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E26 The Deadly Wait Just released from prison, Dan Maury comes to North Fork in search of Marshal Micah Torrance, who helped get him locked up. Torrance carries a shotgun everywhere he goes, but Maury plans to wait him out.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S1 E27 The Wrong Man A crooked marshal comes to North Fork looking for a wanted man. He finds a man fitting the futitive's description. He deliberately kills the wrong man to collect the bounty and then blackmails the real outlaw, who wants to keep his past hidden.

programme.title: The Rifleman

programme.title: Cheyenne
programme.desc: S3 E19 Noose at Noon With his friend, Jim O'Neil's hanging scheduled for the next day, Cheyenne visits him in Texas. Jim refuses to tell Cheyenne any details, but Cheyenne uncovers the missing clue that prevents his innocent friend's hanging.

programme.title: War of the Wildcats
programme.desc: During the early days of the Oklahoma oil boom, a greedy, self-assured oilman and a quiet, yet determined cowboy fight for the rights to oil on Indian land. All the while a pretty schoolteacher steals both men's hearts.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E1 Waste Part 1 Micah, Lucas, and Mark are lost and fear they have crossed into dangerous Mexican territory. Their fears become reality when they stumble upon a ghost town and bandits take them prisoner. When Lucas sees Micah being tortured, he must act quickly.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S5 E2 Waste Part 2 After Mexican bandits capture and hold Micah, Lucas, and Mark in a ghost town, Lucas devises a plan that will hopefully lead to freedom. Later, Lucas helps the wife of a bandit give birth, and the bandits finally release them.

programme.title: Legends of the Pony Express
programme.desc: Heroic Pony Express riders and station keepers face deadly terrain, hostile Native Americans, and dangerous outlaws to deliver vital mail across the untamed frontier. Their life-and-death adventures unite the country and become the stuff of legends.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E9 The Trials of Temple Houston Temple Houston, flamboyant son of Sam Houston, works hard to live up to his famous name as a top attorney in the Oklahoma Territory. But his flair for showmanship annoys his courtroom rivals, the Jennings brothers, and the feud erupts into bloodshed.

programme.title: Wild West Chronicles
programme.desc: S3 E12 Annie Oakley & Buffalo Bill's Wild West Showdown When Buffalo Bill adds female sharpshooter Lillian Smith to his Wild West show, it jeopardizes his relationship with the show's current star, Annie Oakley. As the rivalry between Annie and Lillian escalates, the future of the show is put at risk.

programme.title: Into The Wild Frontier
programme.desc: S3 E4 Mason & Dixon: Trailblazing Surveyors English astronomers Charles Mason and Jeremiah Dixon brave deadly terrain and hostile Native Americans to resolve a border dispute in Colonial America. programme.title: The Gatling Gun
programme.desc: An Apache warrior chief is willing to offer gold, and even sacrifice some of his men, to get his hands on Richard J. Gatling's powerful invention. It's up to a cavalry lieutenant, his scout, and a tough rancher to end the chief's deadly ambition.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: When a former Army officer accidentally kills a woman's young son, he offers to escort the grieving mother through dangerous Indian territory on the way to lay the boy to rest at the family homestead.

programme.title: The Rifleman
programme.desc: S2 E32 Meeting at Midnight Lucas' old Army buddy, Tom Benton, comes to North Fork raising a ruckus. Micah arrests him and Lucas bails him out. Benton, an undercover federal agent, wants to stay in jail to hopefully infiltrate a gang of bank robbers.
